item.title: About us
item.author: contact@fnjoin.com (Salman Malik, Archie Cowan)
item.description: We are experts in deploying code to production in the cloud. We have done it hundreds of thousands of times for multiple companies of various sizes. All of it was possible through automation. We can help you automate some of that for your workloads as well, so you can concentrate on running your business and dealing with changes, fast. In addition we can also help you with: Washing dishes Brewing coffee Changing the filters in your HVAC system Filling the TPS reports What else do you need?
